languages.text: Свойство компонента двигателя, характеризующее длительность фазы ускорения и фазы завершения. У двигателей с мощным ускорением и торможением данные фазы длиннее, чем у двигателей со слабым ускорением и торможением.

This parameter of engine {g|Encyclopedia:ShipComponentsGlossary}components{/g} determines the length of the ship's acceleration and end phases (and the size of their respective zones). Engines with stronger acceleration and deceleration have larger acceleration and end movement zones.
languages.original_text: Свойство компонента двигателя, характеризующее длительность фазы ускорения и фазы завершения. У двигателей с мощным ускорением и торможением данные фазы длиннее, чем у двигателей со слабым ускорением и торможением.

traits.locale_text: This parameter of engine components determines the length of the ship's acceleration and end phases (and the size of their respective zones). Engines with stronger acceleration and deceleration have larger acceleration and end movement zones.

This parameter of engine components determines the length of the ship's acceleration and end phases (and the size of their respective zones). Engines with stronger acceleration and deceleration have larger acceleration and end movement zones.

This parameter of engine components determines the length of the ship's acceleration and end phases (and the size of their respective zones). Engines with stronger acceleration and deceleration have larger acceleration and end movement zones.

This parameter of engine {g|Encyclopedia:ShipComponentsGlossary}components{/g} determines the length of the ship's acceleration and end phases (and the size of their respective zones). Engines with stronger acceleration and deceleration have larger acceleration and end movement zones.

This parameter of engine {g|Encyclopedia:ShipComponentsGlossary}components{/g} determines the length of the ship's acceleration and end phases (and the size of their respective zones). Engines with stronger acceleration and deceleration have larger acceleration and end movement zones.

languages.text: Dieser Parameter der {g|Encyclopedia:ShipComponentsGlossary}Antriebskomponenten{/g} bestimmt die Länge der Beschleunigungs- und Endphasen des Schiffs (und die Größe ihrer jeweiligen Zonen). Antriebe mit stärkerer Beschleunigung und Abbremsung haben größere Beschleunigungs- und Endbewegungszonen.
languages.original_text: This parameter of engine {g|Encyclopedia:ShipComponentsGlossary}components{/g} determines the length of the ship's acceleration and end phases (and the size of their respective zones). Engines with stronger acceleration and deceleration have larger acceleration and end movement zones.

traits.locale_text: Dieser Parameter der Antriebskomponenten bestimmt die Länge der Beschleunigungs- und Endphasen des Schiffs (und die Größe ihrer jeweiligen Zonen). Antriebe mit stärkerer Beschleunigung und Abbremsung haben größere Beschleunigungs- und Endbewegungszonen.

languages.text: Ce paramètre relatif aux {g|Encyclopedia:ShipComponentsGlossary}composants{/g} moteur détermine la durée de la phase d'accélération et de la phase finale de déplacement du vaisseau (et la taille de leurs zones respectives). Les moteurs à forte accélération et décélération présentent des zones d'accélération et de fin de déplacement plus étendues.
languages.original_text: This parameter of engine {g|Encyclopedia:ShipComponentsGlossary}components{/g} determines the length of the ship's acceleration and end phases (and the size of their respective zones). Engines with stronger acceleration and deceleration have larger acceleration and end movement zones.

traits.locale_text: Ce paramètre relatif aux composants moteur détermine la longueur de la phase d'accélération et de la phase finale de déplacement du vaisseau (et la taille de leurs zones respectives). Les moteurs à forte accélération et décélération disposent de zones d'accélération et de fin de déplacement plus étendues.

languages.text: 引擎{g|Encyclopedia:ShipComponentsGlossary}组件{/g}的这个属性决定了舰船加速区域与重点区域的长度（以及各自区域的范围）。加速与减速性能较强的引擎，加速区域与终点区域的范围也会比较大。
languages.original_text: This parameter of engine {g|Encyclopedia:ShipComponentsGlossary}components{/g} determines the length of the ship's acceleration and end phases (and the size of their respective zones). Engines with stronger acceleration and deceleration have larger acceleration and end movement zones.

traits.locale_text: 引擎的这个属性决定了舰船加速区域与重点区域的长度（以及各自区域的范围）。加速与减速性能较强的引擎，加速区域与终点区域的范围也会比较大。

languages.text: Este parámetro de los {g|Encyclopedia:ShipComponentsGlossary}componentes{/g} de motor determina la longitud de las fases de aceleración y finalización (y el tamaño de sus respectivas zonas). Los motores con mayor capacidad de aceleración y frenada tienen zonas de movimiento de aceleración y final más grandes.
languages.original_text: This parameter of engine {g|Encyclopedia:ShipComponentsGlossary}components{/g} determines the length of the ship's acceleration and end phases (and the size of their respective zones). Engines with stronger acceleration and deceleration have larger acceleration and end movement zones.

traits.locale_text: Este parámetro de los componentes de motor determina la longitud de las fases de aceleración y finalización (y el tamaño de sus respectivas zonas). Los motores con mayor capacidad de aceleración y frenada tienen zonas de movimiento de aceleración y final más grandes.

languages.original_text: A property of a motor component that characterises the duration of the acceleration phase and the end-of-motion phase. Motors with strong acceleration and deceleration have longer acceleration and deceleration phases than motors with weak acceleration and deceleration.

languages.text: このエンジン{g|Encyclopedia:ShipComponentsGlossary}構成部品{/g}のパラメータは、船の加速段階と終了段階の時間の長さ（およびそれぞれのゾーンの大きさ）を決定する。加速と減速が強いエンジンは、加速ゾーンと移動停止ゾーンが大きくなる。
languages.original_text: This parameter of engine {g|Encyclopedia:ShipComponentsGlossary}components{/g} determines the length of the ship's acceleration and end phases (and the size of their respective zones). Engines with stronger acceleration and deceleration have larger acceleration and end movement zones.

traits.locale_text: このエンジン構成部品のパラメータは、船の加速段階と終了段階の時間の長さ（およびそれぞれのゾーンの大きさ）を決定する。加速と減速が強いエンジンは、加速ゾーンと移動停止ゾーンが大きくなる。

languages.text: Motor {g|Encyclopedia:ShipComponentsGlossary}bileşenlerinin{/g} bu parametresi, geminin hızlanma ve son evrelerinin uzunluğunu (ve ilgili bölgelerin boyutunu) belirler. Daha güçlü hızlanıp yavaşlama özelliğine sahip motorlar, daha büyük hızlanma ve son hareket bölgelerine sahiptir.
languages.original_text: This parameter of engine {g|Encyclopedia:ShipComponentsGlossary}components{/g} determines the length of the ship's acceleration and end phases (and the size of their respective zones). Engines with stronger acceleration and deceleration have larger acceleration and end movement zones.
